featured.text: But no matter what a child eats, brushing after each meal is still the best way to fight cavities.
To discuss how cavities can be treated.
When we eat, the bacteria take our food as their food and produce an acid that destroys the surface of the teeth, causing cavities to form.
The longer the food stays in the mouth, the more likely cavities will develop.
Jackdaws are birds in the crow family often Turtle ants often live in the cavities of dead found in the English countryside.

definition.en_def: A hollow space within a solid object or body.
definition.example: The dentist found a cavity in my tooth.
